briefdescription.para: The widget includes a combobox widget.
The widget includes a searchable line edit widget.
The widget includes a push button for each option in a horizontal layout.
The widget includes a push button for each option in a vertical layout.
The widget includes a push button to clear the selection (current index is set to minus one)
Describes the widget flags.
Default simple string list model.
Custom item model for enriched (combobox) ui.
Currently selected index.
Place holder string.
Filter index on the custom model (if it exists, defaults to 0)
Match mode for the completer (defaults to Qt::MatchExactly)
If non-zero, fixes the width of the auto-completion popup (this can speed up the display considerably, but is not necessary for small number of options)
Get widget representation of the option action.

parameterdescription.para: Widget flags for the configuration of the widget (type)

briefdescription.para: Connect this action to a public action.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to public action to connect to
Whether to also connect descendant child actions

briefdescription.para: Disconnect this action from its public action.

parameterdescription.para: Whether to also disconnect descendant child actions

memberdef.argsstring: (QObject *parent, const QString &title, const QStringList &options=QStringList(), const QString &currentOption="")
memberdef.name: OptionAction

briefdescription.para: Constructor.
Initialize the option action.
Initialize the option action with a custom model.
Get the options.
Get the number of options.
Determines whether an option exists.
Determines whether there are any options.
Set the options.
Set a custom item model for more advanced display of options.
Determines whether the option action has a custom item model.
Get the completion column.
Set the completion column to completionColumn.
Get the completion match mode.

simplesect.para: Match mode for the completer (defaults to Qt::MatchExactly)

briefdescription.para: Set the completion match mode for the completer to completionMatchMode.

parameterdescription.para: Match mode for the completer (defaults to Qt::MatchExactly)

briefdescription.para: Get the current option index.
Set the current option index.
Get the current option index.
Set the current option text.
Get placeholder text (shown when no option selected)
Set placeholder text (shown when no option selected)
Determines whether an option has been selected.
Get the used item model.
Get the fixed width of the completer popup.

simplesect.para: Fixed width of the completer popup (0 means no fixed width, defaults to 0)

briefdescription.para: Set the fixed width of the completer popup to completerPopupFixedWidth.

parameterdescription.para: Fixed width of the completer popup (0 means no fixed width, defaults to 0)

briefdescription.para: Load widget action from variant map.

parameterdescription.para: Variant map representation of the widget action

briefdescription.para: Save widget action to variant map.

simplesect.para: Variant map representation of the widget action

briefdescription.para: Signals that the model changed.
Signals that the custom model changed.
Signals that the current index changed.
Signals that the current text changed.
Signals that the placeholder string changed.
Signals that the completion column changed from previousCompletionColumn to currentCompletionColumn.
Signals that the filter index changed from previousMatchMode to currentMatchMode.
Signals that the completer popup fixed width changed from previousCompleterPopupFixedWidth to currentCompleterPopupFixedWidth.
Option widget action class.

detaileddescription.para: Stores options and creates widgets to interact with these
